entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is being rewarded with 243 Galleons.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is the one who found the suspicious object in her mother's book.

entities.name: miss weasley
entities.description: Miss Weasley is Ginny's mother and has been affected by the ordeal.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise wizard who interrupts to tell Miss Weasley to go to bed.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is the nurse who is still awake and giving out Mandrake juice.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who asks if Hermione is okay.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the victim of the Basilisk and is waking up.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is a powerful wizard who has been defeated by Dumbledore.

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The Basilisk is the monster that attacked Hermione.

relationships.description: Dumbledore interrupts Miss Weasley to tell her to go to bed.
Ron is concerned about Hermione's well-being.
Dumbledore informs Madam Pomfrey that the Basilisk's victims will be waking up soon.
Lord Voldemort has been defeated by Dumbledore.
